passive.name: LOADED DICE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) LOADED DICE
                                Gain 2 to 12 bonus gold upon killing a unit.

q.name: (Q) WILD CARDS
q.description:
(Q) WILD CARDS
 6s   60/70/80/90 
                                
                                
                                Throws three cards, dealing 60 magic damage (60/120/180/240 + 70% ).

w.name: (W) PICK A CARD
w.description:
(W) PICK A CARD
 7/6,5/6/5,5s   40/60/80/100 
                                
                                
                                First Cast: Start shuffling Twisted Fate's deck.Second Cast: Pick a card to empower his next attack.Red Cards deal 82 magic damage (30/50/70/90 + 60%  + 100% ) in an area and slow by 35/40/45/50% for 3 seconds.Blue Cards deal 92 magic damage (40/65/90/115 + 75%  + 100% ) and restore 60/90/120/150 Mana.Gold Cards deal 67 magic damage (15/25/35/45 + 50%  + 100% ) and stun for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2 second.

e.name: (E) STACKED DECK
e.description:
(E) STACKED DECK
 17/16/15/14s   50 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Gain 15/20/25/30% Attack Speed. Every 4th attack deals 50 bonus magic damage (50/80/110/140 + 45% ).Active: Gain 30/35/40/45% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. During this time, attacking enemy champions rolls Loaded Dice.

r.name: (R) DESTINY
r.description:
(R) DESTINY
 100/90/80s   100 
                                
                                
                                First Cast: Reveals all enemy champions for 6/7/8 seconds.Second Cast: Channel for 1.5 seconds to teleport to target location.
